subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matt Every, Danny Lee, Pat Perez and Greg Chalmers were tied at three-under-par 68 for the first-round lead at the Valspar Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
snippet: Matt Every, Danny Lee, Pat Perez and Greg Chalmers were tied at three-under-par 68 for the first-round lead at the Valspar Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
